name: claude-skills
description: A collection of Claude Code skills providing specialized capabilities through modular plugins.

plugins.name: readme-generator
plugins.description: Create cutting-edge README files with modern design, badges, and optional AI-generated logos.

plugins.name: repo-logo-generator
plugins.description: Generate professional logos with native transparent backgrounds. Requires mcp-openrouter MCP server. Use when asked to 'generate a logo' or 'create repo logo'.

plugins.name: claude-settings-optimizer
plugins.description: Optimizes Claude Code settings by analyzing permission whitelists, detecting dangerous patterns, identifying redundancies, and migrating WebFetch domains to sandbox network allowlists.

plugins.name: repo-name-generator
plugins.description: Generate creative, memorable repository names optimized for virality.

plugins.name: mcp-server-creator
plugins.description: Creates MCP servers using FastMCP with production-ready patterns. Use when asked to create an MCP server, build MCP tools, or integrate external APIs with Claude Code.
